info.name: Better Youtube - Dark Mode
info.description: This stylish adds a blue modern design with round edges and blur to youtube. I hope you like my stylish! Highlights: - Rounded edges - Blurred Backgrounds - Fade-In Animations - Socialblade Support Note: This stylish was made for Youtubes Dark Mode so please enable Youtubes Dark Mode. Note 2: If you don't see blurred backgrounds, you may need to enable them in your browser-preference. Otherwise your browser doesn't support blurred backgrounds. More Info If you have feedback or found some bugs let me hear it in the comments!
info.additionalInfo: --- Update: 2020/09/11 --- - fixed white outline on the progress bar preview (Thanks again to Brian Khanzadeh for the bug report!) --- Update: 2020/07/07 --- - fixed performance-bug for the new chapter feature from youtube (Many Thanks to Brian Khanzadeh for the detailed bug report! <3) - updated design for the progress bar --- Update: 2020/05/25 --- - added color theme setting - fixed livechat pinned messages background - color cleanup --- Update: 2020/05/23 --- - added hover-animation on rich metadatas - added unfold-animation on video overlay - fixed playlist bug --- Update: 2020/05/22 --- - completely redesigned - fixed maaany bugs - code cleanup - added blue color theme - added drop-shadows - added fade-in-animations - added live-chat support - added blurred background on thumbnail timestamps and playlist-covers - added blurred background on thumbnail icons - added blurred background on videopreview - added blurred background on channel header - added blurred background on miniplayer

data.title: Translucency is no longer applied to the progress bar previews

options.label: Animated
